text:
Helloscout [http://helloscout.com/] | San Francisco, CA | Onsite

About us: We connect travelers with locals who help find/book awesome experiences. Currently, we use these tools: obj-c, parse.com, express, git, js, html, css.

We're looking for another developer to join our team to build out our web product. We currently have an iOS app and would like to extend its functionality to the web (as well as add in web-specific features). Ideally, you are familiar with a JS front-end framework and node. iOS and/or Android experience would also be a plus

If you're interested/have any questions/just want to say hello, send me an email and I'll get back within a day: liam@helloscout.com
